meanings.definition: To make sexual in character or quality.
meanings.sent1: Some movies sexualize the characters to make the story more interesting.
meanings.sent2: It is not appropriate to sexualize children in any way.
meanings.sent3: The comedian joked that even vegetables can be sexualized in advertisements.
meanings.sent4: The artist used vibrant colors to sexualize the painting and evoke strong emotions.
meanings.sent5: The perfume advertisement tried to sexualize the product by using seductive imagery.

meanings.definition: To attribute sexual characteristics or connotations to.
meanings.sent1: The media often sexualizes celebrities by focusing on their personal lives.
meanings.sent2: It is important not to sexualize someone without their consent.
meanings.sent3: The cartoon character was humorously sexualized by adding a bow tie.
meanings.sent4: The novel cleverly sexualized the protagonist's mysterious aura.
meanings.sent5: The fashion industry tends to sexualize clothing to appeal to a specific audience.
